title: Celestial Library Adventure #29
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Astronomy Wing
rooms.description: A magnificent chamber with a domed ceiling painted to resemble the night sky. Constellations glow with soft starlight, and floating books drift lazily through the air. Ancient telescopes point toward crystalline windows showing distant galaxies. The scent of old parchment and cosmic dust fills the air.

items.name: star chart table
items.description: A large table covered with celestial maps and astronomical instruments

items.name: constellation reference guide
items.description: An ancient tome describing the major constellations
items.text: The Three Sacred Constellations: Orion the Hunter has 7 bright stars. Cassiopeia the Queen has 5 bright stars. The Big Dipper has 7 bright stars. Together they form the key: 7-5-7.

items.name: celestial archive cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet made of dark wood inlaid with silver stars, containing three drawers

items.name: head librarian's note
items.description: A letter written in shimmering ink
items.text: Dear Seeker, you have been chosen as the new Keeper of Celestial Knowledge. To prove yourself worthy, you must know: The library was founded by Astronomer Celestia. The ancient texts rest in the Nebula Archives. You are destined to become the Star Keeper.

items.name: silver star key
items.description: A key shaped like a five-pointed star, made of gleaming silver

items.name: locked glass bookcase
items.description: An ornate bookcase containing rare astronomical texts, secured with a star-shaped lock

items.name: Chronicle of Cosmic Beings
items.description: A heavy tome bound in midnight blue leather with gold constellation patterns
items.text: Chapter on the Guardians: The Moon Guardian watches over dreams and tides. The Sun Guardian brings light and warmth to all worlds. The Star Guardian, keeper of wishes, dwells in the Constellation Chamber where cosmic secrets are kept.

items.name: enchanted telescope
items.description: A brass telescope floating in mid-air, pointed at a specific constellation

items.name: astronomer's observation log
items.description: A journal with detailed astronomical observations
items.text: Final Entry: The Constellation Chamber can only be accessed by those who understand the cosmic order. Remember that Astronomer Celestia founded this sacred library to preserve knowledge among the stars.

items.name: starlit archway
items.description: An elegant archway filled with shimmering light, leading deeper into the library

rooms.name: Hall of Cosmic Knowledge
rooms.description: A grand hallway lined with towering statues of celestial beings carved from luminous crystal. Each statue holds a different astronomical instrument and stands on a pedestal with an inscription. Ethereal music seems to emanate from the walls themselves. At the far end, a massive door decorated with constellation patterns awaits.

items.name: statue of the Moon Guardian
items.description: A serene figure holding a crescent moon staff, carved from pale white crystal
items.text: Inscription: 'Moon Guardian - Protector of Dreams. Watches over the sleeping worlds and guides travelers through the night.'

items.name: statue of the Sun Guardian
items.description: A radiant figure with arms raised toward the sky, carved from golden crystal
items.text: Inscription: 'Sun Guardian - Bringer of Light. Illuminates all knowledge and warms the hearts of seekers.'

items.name: statue of the Star Guardian
items.description: A majestic figure crowned with stars, carved from deep blue crystal that sparkles with inner light
items.text: Inscription: 'Star Guardian - Keeper of Wishes. Dwells eternally in the Constellation Chamber, guardian of cosmic mysteries.'

items.name: reading alcove
items.description: A cozy nook with cushioned seats and a small table

items.name: scroll of celestial wisdom
items.description: A scroll written in an ancient language that glows when read
items.text: Prophecy: The one who seeks the Celestial Vault must answer the three questions of the cosmos. Know the founder's name, the guardian's dwelling, and your own destiny.

items.name: crystal display pedestal
items.description: A pedestal showcasing various celestial artifacts

items.name: enchanted star compass
items.description: A compass that points toward cosmic destinations rather than cardinal directions

items.name: constellation door
items.description: A magnificent door covered in glowing constellation patterns. A crystalline panel displays three questions that pulse with starlight.

password_questions.question: Who founded the Celestial Library?
password_questions.hint: Check the librarian's note and observation log in the Astronomy Wing

password_questions.question: Where does the Star Guardian dwell?
password_questions.hint: Read the Chronicle of Cosmic Beings and the Star Guardian's statue inscription

password_questions.question: What is your destiny?
password_questions.hint: The head librarian's note reveals your destined role

rooms.name: Celestial Vault
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the Celestial Library! The chamber is a perfect sphere with walls that display the entire universe in motion - galaxies spiral, stars are born and die, and cosmic phenomena dance across the surface. In the center floats the Codex of Infinite Stars, an ancient book that contains all celestial knowledge. As you approach, it opens and your name appears in glowing letters, confirming you as the new Star Keeper.

items.name: Codex of Infinite Stars
items.description: An ancient tome that floats in mid-air, its pages filled with living starlight and cosmic wisdom
items.text: The Codex recognizes you as the new Star Keeper. All the knowledge of the cosmos is now yours to protect and share. The library accepts you as its guardian.

items.name: throne of starlight
items.description: A magnificent throne woven from pure starlight, the seat of the Star Keeper

items.name: living universe display
items.description: The walls themselves, showing the entire cosmos in breathtaking detail

rooms.win_message: Congratulations! You have proven yourself worthy and become the new Star Keeper of the Celestial Library. The Codex of Infinite Stars has accepted you as its guardian. You now possess all the cosmic knowledge contained within these hallowed halls. The constellations themselves celebrate your achievement, and your name will be written among the stars for eternity. You win!
